lord.of.rome

Class Merchant

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.DrawableObject
      • lord.of.rome.Creature
        • lord.of.rome.Merchant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Moveable

    public final class Merchant
extends Creature
    Class which simulates the concept of merchant. It travels between empire settlements and trades with then. Of course it can speak too. Its movement speed depends on weight of traiding wagon, the inner object of merchant instance. Merchant dies when encounters some barbarian horde fraction. It's unable to fight.
    Author:
    Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Merchant

        public Merchant()
        Class constructor. It provides use ready merchant object. Merchant born in some random roman settlement and begins his mercantile travel between emipre settlement.

      • Merchant

        private Merchant(int i)
        Private constructor used for creating cloned version of merchant which could be added to some collections.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • travel

        public void travel()
        Merchant begins his travel between empire settlement. He trades with them, earning gold for him and (as the taxes) for the empire.
